title: Do Positions Even Matter Anymore? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by Yahoo Sports NBA reporter Seerat Sohi to discuss the “Draymond position” and building around positionless players like Zion Williamson and Ben Simmons (02:00). Later, Chris is joined by The Ringer’s Rob Mahoney to build a positionless all-star lineup (21:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Seerat Sohi and Rob Mahoney
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
